name: Fuzion – Write. Create. Dream. AI.
author: Fuzion AI

sections.description:
The plugin allow you to utilize a powerful AI engine to boost your content creation skills. Generate images, content, product descriptions.

FEATURES

Fuzion AI is packed with features to help you generate better content.

  • AI Code – Edit existing or create new code, using the Gutenberg core/code block.
  • AI Images – Generate images with the popular DALL-E model.
  • WooCommerce integration – Unique algorithms for generating product descriptions.
  • SEO optimized – Get detailed SERP stats for selected keywords.
  • Grammar correction: Automatically correct your grammar and spelling mistakes.
  • Expand text: Expand any sentence into a paragraph with a single click.
  • Templates: Generate blog introductions, titles, outlines, brainstorm ideas, based on keywords, and much more.
  • Multiple results: Get multiple results, select one or more that you like and automatically paste it into your post.
  • Creativity levels: Feeling creative and risky? Adjust the creativity level to allow the AI more freedom.
  • Granular controls: Set the maximum length of generated content, adjust the number of results per requests.

FIRST STEPS WITH THE PLUGIN

  1. Install, activate.
  2. Make sure you register for a free account from the Settings – Fuzion menu point.
  3. When creating posts with the Gutenberg editor, all paragraph blocks will automatically have an “AI” icon with various options
  4. Also, you should see an AI icon in the top right corner of the editor, which will allow you to set various settings for generated content.

SUPPORT

If you have any questions, please create a ticket on the WordPress support forums.
Ideas, suggestions, questions – drop us a line at info@getfuzion.io, we will happily assist you with any queries.
sections.installation:
1. Upload the plugin to the /wp-content/plugins/ directory
  2. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ menu in WordPress
  3. Enjoy
sections.faq:
How does this work?

The plugin will use an AI engine to generate unique content.

What themes are compatible with Fuzion AI?

While we do not have any limitations for any specific themes, we do require the use of the Gutenberg editor.
This requirement might change in the future.

Am I required to create an account?

Yes, due to legal requirements for the use of our API, we are required to make sure requests come only from registered users.

How much does this cost?

There are no limitations in the free version of the plugin, however we do limit the number of requests that can be made to the AI engine.
Free users are limited to generation of ~1500 words, 5 images and 5 SEO queries per month.

Are there any limitations?

Yes, the API prohibits generation of certain topics in relation to hate, harassment, violence, self-harm, sexual, political, deception and malware.
Our API will automatically block out the generation of such content. We reserve the right to block any user who abuses the following terms.

I have other questions, how can I contact you?

Feel free to create a topic on the WordPress support forums or drop us an email at info@getfuzion.io, and we would be more than happy to help you out.
sections.changelog:
1.4.1 – 27 Oct 2023

Changes and fixes:
* Updated all dependencies
* Bumped tested up to version

1.4.0 – 29 Jan 2023

New features:
* Improved list of content templates
* Template to generate post titles
* Generate code directly from the core/code Gutenberg block
* Edit or extend existing code in the core/code Gutenberg block
* Added icons to block AI options

Changes and fixes:
* List will now be automatically converted to a list block in the editor
* Fix permissions, when editors were not able to generate content
* Improve error handling, when there’s an issue with the API key
* Clear out errors, when regenerating content

1.3.0 – 11 Jan 2023

New features:
* Generate images with AI
* WooCommerce integration – generate product descriptions

Changes and fixes:
* Backward compatibility with older PHP versions

1.2.0 – 04 Dec 2022

New features:
* SEO keyword analysis

Changes and fixes:
* Improve account stats and credit usage
* Fixed notices stacking in the Gutenberg editor

1.1.0 – 16 Oct 2022

Added new templates:
* Generate titles or brainstorm ideas based on keywords
* Generate lists
* TL;DR summarization

Changes and fixes:
* Add “Expand text” template to the Gutenberg side panel
* Fix deprecation warning in Gutenberg editor
* Increase timeout for API requests
* Improve selection UX, when only one variant is returned from the API
* Minor UI/UX improvements

1.0.1 – 13 Oct 2022

This release addresses issues with the registration process from the plugin.

1.0.0 – 08 Oct 2022

This is the first release with the following set of features:
* Grammar correction
* Expand text feature
* Introduction and outline templates
* Control creativity levels
* Set number of results
* Control maximum length of generated content
